body_html:
This happened to me when I configured the system to use CUDA 6.x but had 7.x installed and dylib/symlinks weren't updated correctly.

My suggestion would be to clean out your CUDA/CUDNN installation, and reconfigure in a clean environment.

body:
This happened to me when I configured the system to use CUDA 6.x but had 7.x installed and dylib/symlinks weren't updated correctly.

My suggestion would be to clean out your CUDA/CUDNN installation, and reconfigure in a clean environment.
